general_info.description: Methotrexate is a chemotherapy drug used to treat cancer and autoimmune diseases.

when_to_take.with_food: Take with food to reduce stomach upset
when_to_take.special_instructions: Do not take more than prescribed, as it can be toxic

general_info.description: Vincristine is a chemotherapy drug used to treat various types of cancer.

when_to_take.with_food: No food or drink for 1 hour before and after administration
when_to_take.special_instructions: Do not take more than prescribed, as it can be toxic

general_info.description: Prednisone is a corticosteroid drug used to treat various conditions, including inflammation and autoimmune diseases.

when_to_take.with_food: Take with food to reduce stomach upset
when_to_take.special_instructions: Do not stop taking suddenly, as it can cause withdrawal symptoms
